spaceInvaders

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaceInvaders.Ship
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener, Sprite

    public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
implements Sprite, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    Ship class. This is the player and is controlled by the arrow keys. Can shoot with the space bar. Starts the game with 3 lives and loses one if it hits anything.
    Version:
    May 25, 2020
    Author:
    Matthew Wang and Christopher Kim, Period: 1, Assignment: APCS_Final_Project, Sources: TODO

            int vx,
            int vy,
            int w,
            int h,
            int r,
            int[] s)
        constructor
        Parameters:
        x - initial x
        y - initial y
        vx - initial velocity x
        vy - initial velocity y
        w - width
        h - height
        r - radius
        s - size of the screen (to keep in bounds)
